Considering it's the kind of movies my old folk like the most, I would say the same.

Man, the first things I ever saw were two guys beating each other and tons of gunfire and that good 80's and 90's stuff. Not Disney, neither Sesame Street. It was Saint Seiya, Batman Returns and Demolition Man the first things I layed my eyes on.

Great childhood mudafakas!
